# Learning goals

In this lab, you will...

-   learn how to effectively visualize numeric and categorical data.
-   continue developing a workflow for reproducible data analysis.

# Getting started

-   Go to tganization on GitHub. Click on the repo with the prefix
    **lab-01**. It contains the starter documents you need to complete
    the lab.

-   Clone the repo and start a new project in RStudio. See t on cloning
    a repo and starting a new R project.
